title: HOW DO I LANE AGAINST MORDE AS MELEE?

replies.body:
You don't.

Bend over and accept your fate.

Real talk though, there are a few hard melee counter picks that work well or can hold their ground.

But first a few basic things:
-Morde thrives in extended trades due to his shield and harvester healing
-Don't fight him in your own minion waves or he'll just get a ton of free shield
-Kill his W'd minion to deny him the spell
-Disengage when he q's

Typically Morde wins against most melees due to being a juggernaut like Illaoi and Darius but these few can totally ruin his day, go even or just survive him

It's a dodge and dodge's and blocks avoid the effect on on hit spell effects.

I cant find any references to Mace of Spades being an on-hit effect.  If I was to hazard a guess the ability might act like a single target spell that's limited to Mordekaiser's auto attack range.  This would make sense if you consider the bug with Titanic Hydra.  If your not aware, Titanic Hydra wont proc if Mace of Spades damage is enough to finish off its target.  Thinking about it I'd say Mace of Spades hits first followed by a basic attack that's 'hidden' under the spell effect.

Edit:  There is mention that Mace of Spades will proc on-hit effects.  This explains my Triforce damage blowing past Jax shield
